info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:02PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broadwater, north central Madison and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 202 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Whitehall, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitehall, Lewis And Clark Caverns State Park and Cardwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
